page.title: 13SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY 2
page.content: world. PIG AND SHEEP RESEARCH STATION - This covers a 182 acre site,160 acres of roads,buildings,woods.Currently 1500 pigs and 900 sheep are on the station. Breeding research is carried out on the Landrace,Large white and Duroc breeds.Modern pig buildings completed in 1985. SCOTTISH CROP RESEARCH INSTITUTE - PENTLANDFIELD STATION - This was formed by the amalgamation of the Scottish Horticultural Research Institute and the Scottish Plant Breeding Station.Research is directed at solving the problems of crop production in North Britain.At Pentlandfield new improved varieties of potatoes and cereals are produced. THE DEPOT - Bush Estate. In 1972 a ten-year experiment produced an animal food - The Complete Diet - which is
